name: game-of-life-server
description: Backend server for Game of Life classroom simulation

scripts.build: rimraf dist && node node_modules/typescript/lib/tsc.js && node node_modules/copyfiles/index.js src/database/*.sql dist/database/ --flat && node node_modules/copyfiles/index.js migrations/*.sql dist/migrations/ --flat && node node_modules/copyfiles/index.js seed-town-hub.js dist/ && node copy-wordle-words.js
